    • splitLocation

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> splitLocation(String sub)
      Takes a string in the form of a location (e.g. Arkansas, US), and splits it be the comma, returning an Observable list with 2 items: Arkansas, US
      Parameters:
      sub - string to be divided
      Returns:
      list ObservableList with 2 elements

    • splitID

      public static int splitID(String comboBoxInput)
      Gets ComboBox value (e.g. 3 Geoffrey James) and splits it to get the customer/contact/user id
      Parameters:
      comboBoxInput - ComboBox value
      Returns:
      int id

    • getNextAppointmentID

      public static int getNextAppointmentID() throws SQLException
      Returns the lowest available id number. prev contains the id of the previous customer in iteration ex. if newID is 4, and the previous id was 1, there is no item at 2 (due to deletion). In this scenario, it would return 2. if there are no gaps, the newID would be the id of last item incremented
      Returns:
      newID returns 1 if empty list, returns highest
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getNextCustomerID

      public static int getNextCustomerID() throws SQLException
      Returns the lowest available id number. prev contains the id of the previous customer in iteration ex. if newID is 4, and the previous id was 1, there is no item at 2 (due to deletion). In this scenario, it would return 2. if there are no gaps, the newID would be the id of last item incremented
      Returns:
      newID returns 1 if empty list, returns highest
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • loginActivity

      public static void loginActivity(String username, boolean successOrFail) throws IOException
      Records both successful and failed login attempts in login_activity.txt
      Parameters:
      username - attempted username input
      successOrFail - true if successful login, false if not
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> filteredAppointmentsForReport(int contactID) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      contactID - selected contact
      Returns:
      temp filtered list of appointments assigned to contact
      Throws:
      SQLException
